mapper.insert: INSERT INTO requirement ( requirement_code, project_id, scheme_id, creator_id, purpose, priority, status, remark ) VALUES ( #{requirementCode}, #{projectId}, #{schemeId}, #{creatorId}, #{purpose}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, p.project_name, s.scheme_name, u.real_name as creator_name, u.role as creator_role, au.real_name as auditor_name FROM requirement r LEFT JOIN project p ON r.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN scheme s ON r.scheme_id = s.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON r.creator_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_user au ON r.auditor_id = au.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
